description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nPrismatic One:
At the start of battle, this creature's class is randomized, prioritizing classes not on your team. Then, it copies the top-most Spell Gem of each ally of a different class, but current {STAT_charges} are set to 1.
name: Opalescent Eye
